arts.ttl: Transfer news and rumours today: Newcastle set Lloyd Kelly asking price, Andres Garcia to Aston Villa, Wilfried Zaha to MLS

arts.ttl: Official | Mahamadou Diawara joins Le Havre on loan from Lyon
arts.sum: Lyon midfielder Mahamadou Diawara (19) has joined Ligue 1 rivals Le Havre on loan, both clubs have announced. The France U21 international’s loan from Rhône to Normandy includes no option…

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich and Borussia Dortmund to go head-to-head for Lyon’s Rayan Cherki

arts.ttl: Everton reach agreement with Lyon for transfer of Ernest Nuamah
arts.sum: Everton’s attempts to sign Ernest Nuamah from Lyon had gone quiet over the past 24 hours or so, but it appears that just meant the Premier League club were working on reaching an agreement behind the scenes.
